- Carefully leverage the information provided to achieve your non-repetitiveness and seamless natural continuitty core objectives.
- Focus on NEW developments: do NOT repeat facts already said unless something changed about them.
- You may start sentences without 'You' to vary cadence.
- Produce exactly 1-2 sentences continuing the interactive fiction scene (no bullet lists, no JSON)
- Never invent objects or knowledge beyond the provided transcript/context.
